Subject: Welcome to smallsoft!
Paragraphs:
Dear NEW HIRE,

I am delighted to welcome you to smallsoft as our new Email Filter Specialist. As discussed during the interview process, your primary responsibility will be to review and categorize incoming emails as legitimate or spam, thereby ensuring that our company's email communications are secure and reliable.

Simply click the checkmark or trash icon to sort the emails into their appropriate categories.

Please take some time to get familiarized with our company's email system and filtering policies.

Any emails from our team @smallsoft.comp should be passed. You should also pass emails from senders who are collaborating with our team members It's important to pass these emails to prevent interruption of productivity.

Any other kinds of emails (with few exceptions) should be trashed to prevent compromises of our systems and maintain free space on the server.

NOTE: You WILL be TERMINATED if the server runs out of storage space. This is your only job here at smallsoft, and we need you to do it right.

If you have any questions or need any assistance, do not hesitate to reach out to me or the IT department. Once again, welcome to the team! We are thrilled to have you onboard.

You will begin work immediately after passing this email.

Good luck,

Administrator
